synopsis.text:
Nanao Kisaragi, Kaito Onogi, and Minato Narumiya find themselves united by a shared interest in the ancient art of Japanese archery, or kyudo, at Prefectural Kazemai High School. Under the guidance of their club advisor, Tommy-sensei, the trio is joined by Minato's childhood friends, Seiya Takehaya and Ryohei Yamanouchi.

Once an accomplished archer, Minato had abandoned the sport after a mysterious incident. Despite his initial reluctance to rejoin the world of kyudo, Minato finds himself drawn back in by the enthusiasm of his friends and the allure of competition.

As they hone their skills and face the challenges that come with mastering this demanding martial art, the five young men form a tight-knit bond. Together, they set their sights on winning the prefectural tournament, embarking on a journey that will test their friendship, determination, and archery prowess. Will their combined efforts be enough to overcome Minato's past and secure victory in the prestigious tournament? Join them in this heartwarming tale of youth, friendship, and the thrill of competition.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
